docs.text: I'm a PhD who works on the statistical physics as applied to complex networks and complex systems. Now, I am a Research Associate Professor at School of Engineering Science, University of Science and Technology of China. News 2021年2月22日，利用爆炸渗流找网络中重要节点的一篇论文已被 New Journal of Physics 接收，恭喜智浩。 arXiv:2102.12101 . 关于网络渗流方面的综述性论文已被Physics Reports接收，全文可在arXiv获取。感谢几位合作者。 Percolation on complex networks: Theory and application . Ming Li , Run-Ran Liu, Linyuan Lü, Mao-Bin Hu, Shuqi Xu, and Yi-Cheng Zhang. Physics Reports, 2021 in press . arXiv:2101.11761 . 参与编著的新书《网络渗流》由高等教育出版社出版了！ 出版社链接 2021年第一篇论文于1月14日被J. Stat. Mech.接收，感谢合作者彭丹。 Organization of cooperation in fractal structures . Dan Peng and Ming Li *. arXiv:2010.06800 . Traffic-induced epidemic suppression in multiplex networks . Jie Chen, Mao-Bin Hu*, Yong-Hong Wu, and Ming Li *. J. Stat. Mech. 2020 (2020) 113403 . Scaling features in the spreading of COVID-19 . Ming Li , Jie Chen, and Youjin Deng. arXiv:2002.09199 . History-dependent percolation on multiplex networks . Ming Li , Linyuan Lü, Youjin Deng, Mao-Bin Hu, Hao Wang, Matúš Medo, and H. Eugene Stanley. National Science Review 7 (2020) 1296–1305 . arXiv:2002.08079 .

docs.title: News

docs.text: Curriculum Vitae I recived B.S. degree from Anhui University in 2009. Then, I studied the statistical physics as applied to complex networks and complex systems at University of Science and Technology of China, and recived Ph.D. degree in 2014. From 2014 to 2016, I was a Post-doctoral Fellower in the Department of Modern Physics at University of Science and Technology of China. In the first half of 2016, I also worked at Department of Applied Physics, The Hong Kong Polytechnic University as a Post-doctoral Fellower. Since September 2016, I work at School of Engineering Science, University of Science and Technology of China as a Research Associate Professor. Here is my CV . Research Interests Percolation transition Phase transition and critical phenomena in networked systems Network structure analysis Spreading and traffic processes in networks Publications Please refer to Publications or Google Scholar .
docs.title: About Me

Then, I studied the statistical physics as applied to complex networks and complex systems at University of Science and Technology of China, and recived Ph.D. degree in 2014. From 2014 to 2016, I was a Post-doctoral Fellower in the Department of Modern Physics at University of Science and Technology of China. In the first half of 2016, I also worked at Department of Applied Physics, The Hong Kong Polytechnic University as a Post-doctoral Fellower. Since September 2016, I work at School of Engineering Science, University of Science and Technology of China as a Research Associate Professor. Here is my CV .

docs.text: If you have any questions or comments, please feel free to contact me. Here are my contact details: Address: Department of Thermal Science and Energy Engineering, School of Engineering Science, University of Science and Technology of China, No.96, JinZhai Road Baohe District, Hefei, 230026, P.R. China Tel: +86-551-63600127 Email: minglichn@ustc.edu.cn
docs.title: Contact

docs.text: Since 2011, I have published 38 articles with collaborators in peer-reviewed journals and a book. These include: Physical Review E (3), National Science Review (1), Physics Reports (1), New Journal of Physics (2), Journal of Statistical Mechanics (4), Chaos, Solitons & Fractals (1), Europhysics Letters (3), Physics Letters A (1), PLoS ONE (1), Scientific Reports (3), Physica A (8), Chinese Physics Letters (1), Chinese Physics B (4), conference papers (2), and journals in Chinese (3).
